name: 3×3EYES～吸精公主～　Premium CD
summary:

Tracks 01-09 -- Music Compilation
Game BGM by Jun Fujisaka (藤坂 潤)

Track 10 -- Character Introduction
Host: Minkii Yasu
Cast:

Track 11-12 -- Seiyuu Interview
Seiyu Interview 1
Koji Tsujitani (Yakumo)
Tomohiro Nishimura (Haan)

Seiyu Interview 2
Manami Komori (Yuihowa)
Megumi Hayashibara (Pai)

Interviewer: Minkii Yasu (Yasuo Iwasaki)
